revised_title: Muscular Contraction and Relaxation: The Role of Polypeptide Chain Folding
tldr: The authors discuss the physical and chemical basis of muscular contraction and relaxation, proposing a model of a folded polypeptide chain. They suggest that the folding of myosin molecules during muscle contraction could be related to the heat of shortening and the number of interacting groups.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
